mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(create_date, "%Y-%m-%d") as createDate, COUNT(1) as count from statistics where create_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_date, "%Y-%m-%d") ORDER BY create_date asc;

select DATE_FORMAT(create_date, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i") as createDate, COUNT(1) as count from statistics
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_date, "%Y-%m-%d %H") ORDER BY create_date asc
